channel.title: Persons mentioned (INCOMPLETE LIST!) on ECTHRwatch
channel.description: Recent content in Persons mentioned (INCOMPLETE LIST!) on ECTHRwatch

item.title: Mahonri MANJARREZ
item.description: Mahonri MANJARREZ Federal Bureau of Investigation My communications to Mr. Manjarrez are published on (Mahonri-Manjarrez.Federal-Bureau-of-Investigation.com)[https://Mahonri-Manjarrez.Federal-Bureau-of-Investigation.com].

item.title: Florence HERMITE
item.description: Florence HERMITE Florence HERMITE might have been notified while she was working for the French Prime Minister Édouard PHILIPPE. She is currently working as Justice Attachée (Magistrat de liaison) at the French Embassy in the United States.

item.title: Adam Rogalski
item.description: Adam Rogalski Federal Bureau of Investigation Assistant Legal Attaché My communications to Mr. Rogalski are published on (Adam-Rogalski.Federal-Bureau-of-Investigation.com)[https://Adam-Rogalski.Federal-Bureau-of-Investigation.com].

item.title: Christopher Asher WRAY
item.description: Check carefully who monitors the F.B.I. since Christopher Asher WRAY declared, if I am not mistaken, that he had a financial stake in McDonalds Corporation. Possible conflict of interests. Therefore, just to be safe, I should also notify other officials. It’s one of the biggest fraud in history. We can’t leave anything to chance. For the sake of transparency, open letters to Mr. Wray will be published on Christopher-Asher-Wray.com.

item.title: Pascal LE LUONG
item.description: Pascal LE LUONG is related to Chantal ARENS.

item.title: Frédéric PÉCHENARD
item.description: Frédéric Péchenard, former head of the French National Police and best friend of Éric Andrieu.

item.title: Éric ANDRIEU
item.description: Éric Andrieu, best friend of Frédéric Péchenard. An independent investigation should determine whether Éric Andrieu could be affiliated to Thomas Andrieu. Most likely not.

item.title: Valentine ROUX
item.description: Valentine ROUX Explain the link between Phlippe MOURICOU, Cédric VILLANI, and Valentine ROUX.

item.title: Jean-Pierre PETIT
item.description: Jean-Pierre PETIT, former CEO of McDonald’s France.

item.title: Chantal ARENS, Court of Cassation
item.description: Chantal Arens Court of Cassation Small introduction on Chantal Arens.

item.title: Chris KEMPCZINSKI
item.description: For the sake of transparency, I will publish some of my communications to Mr. Kempczinski on the website Kempczinski.com.

item.title: Emmanuel MACRON
item.description: Emmanuel Macron President of France Small introduction on Emmanuel Macron and his involvement. It’s related to Jean-Michel HAYAT There is a dedicated website, Macron-Emmanuel.com, on which are published open letters addressed to the French President.
